CMDS.Note: NOTE: If you create a directory it will create that directory in the current directory.
CMDS.cd: To change directory, just input the directory you desire. (e.g. cd C:\ -> C:\)
CMDS.create_folders: Creates folders based on inputs in JSON File (You may edit the JSON file)
CMDS.makedir: makes a new directory at current directory - (input: makedir DIRECTORY_NAME)
